response.original_title: The World of Peter Rabbit and Friends: The Tale of Samuel Whiskers or The Roly-Poly Pudding
response.overview: "The World of Peter Rabbit and Friends", episode 3. While hiding from his mother Tabitha, Tom Kitten got caught by two rats who wants to turn him into a nice pudding.
response.title: The World of Peter Rabbit and Friends: The Tale of Samuel Whiskers or The Roly-Poly Pudding
